about_the_game:
Inspired by the sacred aura and secular might of the Holy Roman Empire, this music collection from composer Utopia adds ten new songs to Europa Universalis IV. Drawing on the motifs of Empire, Order, Diplomacy and Piety, these original compositions highlight the vibrancy and majesty of the Holy Roman Empire at the peak of its power in the early modern era.

The songs included in this collection are:

  • Now Rise, My Loyal Subjects
  • A Continuation of Diplomacy
  • Prussian Ambitions
  • Order and Diplomacy
  • Life Under the Shadow Kingdom
  • Election of a Habsburg
  • Autumn in Aachen
  • Ninety-Five Theses
  • Imperial Diet
  • Charlemagne’s Legacy

Inspired by the sacred aura and secular might of the Holy Roman Empire, this music collection from composer Utopia adds ten new songs to Europa Universalis IV. Drawing on the motifs of Empire, Order, Diplomacy and Piety, these original compositions highlight the vibrancy and majesty of the Holy Roman Empire at the peak of its power in the early modern era.

The songs included in this collection are:
